SELECT * FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() Over(order by a.LastUpdateTime desc ) as rowNum, a.*,b.Name as ActivityGroupName from T_CTW_LEventTemplate as a left join SysMarketingGroupType as b on a.ActivityGroupId=b.ActivityGroupId and b.IsDelete=0 where a.IsDelete=0
a.TemplateName like '%'+#TemplateName#+'%'
a.ActivityGroupId = #ActivityGroupId#
a.TemplateStatus = #TemplateStatus#
) as t where rowNum > #StartPage# and rowNum <= #EndPage#
